alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Telfair; Toombs; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 3:19PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Toombs, east central Telfair, southeastern Wheeler and southern Montgomery Counties through 345 PM EST... At 319 PM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Lumber City, or 9 miles northwest of Hazlehurst, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... Lumber City, Uvalda, Alston, Towns, Spring Hill, Rock Springs, Jordan and Charlotteville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central and southeastern Georgia.
